name: Recoil Suppressor
description: Lowers the recoil when firing. Note that lower recoil also means higher rate of fire, essentially improving damage output. Effectiveness varies with what ammo type is being used.

name: Reload Assist
description: Speeds up reload times. Effectiveness varies with what ammo type is being used.

name: Deviation Suppressor
description: Lowers deviation. Can only be used if the bowgun has deviation.

name: Close Range Up
description: Adds an extra slot. Stack with other upgrades to increase the slot's level.

name: Long Range Up
description: Regain health as you land attacks. Stack with other upgrades to increase the amount of health regained.

name: Shield
description: Regain health as you land attacks. Stack with other upgrades to increase the amount of health regained.

name: Special Scope
description: Enables an even deadlier Critical Range when readying the special scope. Does not Stack. (HBG Only)

name: Evading Reload
description: Reload ammo while performing an evasive slide. Equipping two or more increases amount reloaded. (LHB Only)

name: Wyvernheart Mod
description: Icreases Wyvernheart poer as succesive hit a monster. Does not stack.

name: Wyvernsnipe Mod
description: Wyvernsnipe rounds no longer penetrate, but become extremely effective against weak points. Does not stack.

name: Wyvernblast Mod
description: Enables Wyvernblast Counter. A Forward firing mine that detonates inmediately or on impact. Does not stack.

name: Power Barrel
description: Enchances piercing damage and boosts stun and exhaust effects. Only one barrel type can be equipped. Does not stack.

name: Long Barrel
description: Enchances ammo speed, extending both maximum and critical range. Only one barrel type can be equipped. Does not stack.
